Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~ozheregelya is this related to INDY-793 where the missing transaction only happens when the conditions of INDY-793 are seen?

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: ~ozheregelya is this related to INDY-793 where the missing transaction only happens when the conditions of INDY-793 are seen?

Action.author: ozheregelya
Action.body: ~krw910 , I think that INDY-793 and INDY-795 are different problems. INDY-793 doesn't result missing of transactions. These problems sometimes reproduce together (as you can see in ^perf_results_1_500_1504008551.csv ) because INDY-793 reproduces very often. But sometimes INDY-795 reproduces alone (for instance here: ^perf_results_5_500_1504019490.csv ).

Action.author: derashe
Action.body: load_test.py deprecated. In actual version of load test no such a problem have been noticed
